name: Welcome to Our House!
description:
This is a project I made for my First Year Narrative for Game Design assignment using Twine. It is a mystery thriller. The dialogues were originally made for a visual novel so they might read a little different than your typical books. This is an early beta, and I will go back to fix things later when school is over. I have not properly playtested the game, so please give me feedback when you play.

If you want to restart from the start of the game, you will have to close your tab and re-open the link. Because sadly, that is how Sugarcube works (I think).

Okay, that's it, enjoy and let me know what you think!
